author: sandygao
msg: Fix the last few schema 1.1 failures: a) unrecognized block names in regular expressions are not errors; they match all characters. b) new rules about '-' in regular expressions. c) wildcard unions are always expressible d) override allows simple type and complex type have the same name. Only the actual match will be used. The other is ignored.
